hero.title:
Toit Bangalore
Craft Brews & Culinary Delights
hero.subtitle: Experience the vibrant atmosphere, exceptional craft beers, and delicious food at one of Bangalore's first microbreweries.

about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph1: The first Toit to open its doors and one of the city’s first microbreweries. We wanted to give people a place to be themselves – while enjoying some great brews, food, and ambience.  A place where conversations flow as freely as our freshly crafted beers, and where the aroma of delicious food fills the air.
about.paragraph2: From our signature brews to our innovative culinary creations, we're dedicated to providing an unforgettable experience. Come discover the Toit difference – a blend of passion, craftsmanship, and community.
